EDII Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Coordinator Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 14:11 IST
 Maharashtra Public Service Commission
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Karnataka |  Salary : 45,000 to 55,000




FOLLOW

The Entrepreneurship Development Institute of India (EDII) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Coordinator Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech and MBA students can apply for the EDII Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs,  candidates can also apply for jobs in Karnataka.

EDII Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Project Coordinator	01	B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, MBA

EDII Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

EDII Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the 

Written Test.
Interview.

EDII Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

EDII Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 45,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 55,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the EDII Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the EDII Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
If you are eligible.
Gather all the required documents.
Attach all the required documents to the resume.
Submit the documents to the mentioned e-mail address.

E-mail Address:

hrsro@ediindia.org.

Important Dates:

Starting date	26-08-2025
Closing date	05-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
